SEARCH
Package simu.model

Class Asiakas

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Asiakas
public class Asiakas extends Object
The `Asiakas` class models a customer in a simulation. It tracks the customer's arrival and departure times, goals, and satisfaction. It also generates statistical data such as average service time and overall happiness rating. This class supports dynamic customer attributes and performance reporting.

Each customer has a unique identifier, and the class keeps track of the total number of customers, the total time spent by all customers, and the number of services done. It also calculates the average happiness rating of customers.

The class also provides methods for getting and setting the customer's arrival and departure times, checking if the customer has a reservation, and getting the customer's target. It also provides methods for generating a report about the customer, calculating the happiness rating of a customer based on the time they spent, getting the average time spent by all customers, and getting the average happiness rating of all customers.

Finally, the class provides a static method for resetting all static variables to their initial values.
